question: Which among the following is correct regarding Arunachal Pradesh?
option1: Lok Sabha Seat 1 Rajya Sabha Seats 2
option2: Lok Sabha Seats 2 Rajya Sabha Seats 2
option3: Lok Sabha Seats 3 Rajya Sabha Seats 2
option4: Lok Sabha Seats 2 Rajya Sabha Seat 1
answer: Lok Sabha Seats 2 Rajya Sabha Seat 1
explanation: Arunachal Pradesh has 2 Lok Sabha seats viz. Arunachal East and Arunachal West. It has one Rajya Sabha seat only.
